name: Rose Quartz Eyeshadow Palette
about: What it is:A palette that allows you to play with and create magnetic makeup looks offering 18 rosy tints and earthy shades across five different textures...Ingredient Callouts:This product is cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This powerful palette includes eight velvety-soft pigmented mattes; three high-shine buttery metallics; three pearly, soft-shine metallics; three quartz-inspired multi-shimmer marble creams; and one pearly gloss hybrid. The shades blend true to color and were designed to look vibrant and stunning on everyone..This Set Contains:.Palette Size:Full size

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Build your base with the matte powder shadows. .-Pick up metallics and cream shimmers using a brush in small circular motions. .-Apply on lids for an illuminating finish. .-Build an extra layer using your fingers or a sponge brush for a high-shine foil effect. .-For a soft pearlescent glow, apply the pearl gloss hybrid to bare lids using your finger or a flat brush...Huda‚Äôs Hacks:.-For deeper shades, blend is your friend. Brushes are super important to get a smooth finish in the crease and across the lid. .-Not all deep shades have to be bold and graphic. Blend out the deep mattes with a fluffy brush to give definition and shape to the eyes without overtaking the entire makeup look. .-For soft daytime looks, build a light base using matte shades, adding shimmer across the lid using your finger, a flat brush, or a sponge applicator. .-The metallics and pearl gloss hybrid can also be used to contour the lower lash line. Add to inner corners for a soft highlight to keep eyes looking big and bright.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve had this palette for a year and I‚Äôm obsessed; as a pink/brown girl it‚Äôs perfect, the shades are pigmented and smooth, even the sparkly ones don‚Äôt have a ton of fallout which I love!!!  The ‚Äúcream marble‚Äù shadows are exquisite and some of my favs ever.  I use ‚ÄòMoon Magic‚Äô and ‚ÄòSelf Love‚Äô for my inner-corners and always get compliments!  I don‚Äôt use the glossy one ‚ÄòLove Stone‚Äô as much as I should and even after this time it hasn‚Äôt dried out!  Honestly my favourite palette I own <3xo

reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors and textures, but multiple pans had crumbled when I received it. I was able to press them back into shape, except for one shade that kept crumbling until it broke everywhere and wasn't fixable. Shane, it was the best color.

reviews.review_text: It's my all-time favorite pallet! I get compliments every time I use this

reviews.review_text: The pinks in this pallet are so pretty Huda. Beauty is my new favorite line she supports watermelon. And I will continue to buy from her
